movie-description: Horror movie about a cursed house in Turin and the three relatives who inherit it. Two brothers and their cousin Elisa (who haven't seen each other since childhood) are brought together after their mother's death. They inherit her house under the condition that they live there together and never divide or sell the property. It's haunted and after many ghostly nightmares and some murders, Elisa finds a diary in the attic, learning that she is the sole survivor of "the seventh damned generation."
movie-short-description: Directed by Carlo Ausino.  With Beba Loncar, Jean-Pierre Aumont, Annarita Grapputo, George Ardisson. A couple inherits a mansion, but when they move in they discover that it is haunted by the murderous spirits of people who have died there.
